author: @beforeitsnews
title: This shop is SCANNING your face | EU | Before It's News
text: This shop is SCANNING your face We headed to Wolverhampton to check out a shop that has gone viral for installing facial recognition technology paired with AI EMOTION ANALYSIS in its doorway. Ironically, I was told to leave the shopping centre for asking customers about their reactions to this Orwellian technology, while they are scanning everyone’s faces – potentially unlawfully. The technology is inaccurate, invasive and illiberal. That’s why we’ve written to the ICO to lodge a complaint. Toge The post [This shop is SCANNING your face](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly9iaWdicm90aGVyd2F0Y2gub3JnLnVrL3ZpZGVvcy90aGlzLXNob3AtaXMtc2Nhbm5pbmcteW91ci1mYWNlLw==) appeared first on [Big Brother Watch](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly9iaWdicm90aGVyd2F0Y2gub3JnLnVr).
